title: The Quest (Fantasy Adventure Music)
description: Premium music tracks for your fantasy world. You’ll be covered for full power orchestral boss battles down to brooding dark dungeon ambience. Multiple intensities and looping varieties included. Latest update includes stinger tracks for every composition.
longDescription:
Preview: https://youtu.be/OI5BDMFx4Xs

Premium music tracks for your fantasy world. You’ll be covered for full power orchestral boss battles down to brooding dark dungeon ambience. It’s not strictly medieval, though. Try the track “Not Today” for a pirate assault, or “Gaia” for your mystical indie puzzler.

Each track comes with looping versions and alternate mixes. The lite mixes are great options for more subtle music ambience in-game. Bring in the full mixes for your highest action moments, cinematics, or trailers. The latest update now includes stinger tracks for every piece, useful to bridge transitions, cover a sudden ending, or simply accentuate a gameplay moment. Content is provided in high quality 48kHz/16bit WAV files.
_______________________________
Track Descriptions:

Behemoth's Vengeance (2:08) -- Epic orchestral battle. // orchestra, big drums
Destiny Beckons (2:44) -- Heroic orchestral journey. // orchestra, solo cello
Forgotten Beasts (1:57) -- Dark and threatening. // low strings, drones
Forgotten Depths (1:42) -- Dark and ambient. // low strings, drones
Gaia (2:16) -- Mystic reflective. // drones, reverse harp
Lore and Legends (1:23) -- Calm storytelling. // harp, guitar, chant
Not Today (1:38) -- Action adventure. // orchestra, cello, percussion
The Inquisitive Muse (1:52) -- Light playful. // piano, glass chimes, harp
Willowrun Tavern (1:02) -- Energetic folktune. // dulcimer, flute, guitar, drums
Willowrun Village (2:09) -- Peaceful folktune. // solo cello, dulcimer, guitar, harp
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 120 audio files (variations of loop lengths and alternate mixes of the 10 main pieces, as well as new one-hit stingers)
Number of Audio Cues: 10 original compositions
Sample rate \ bit rate: 48 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes
How many minutes of audio provided: 19 minutes of original music. 114 minutes of total audio for all mixes and length options.
Documentation Included: Yes
